ygData.subject: Re: Humble youth seeking enlightenemt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, that makes perfect sense; I hadn t sat down to work out the math like that, but now that you present it to me, I find it logical and correct.
ygData.messageBody:
--- Sean.Clark@... wrote:
> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> For all of you interested in the math, the lack of
> importance between levels in groups for high level
> characters makes sense:
> Take the 2 cases mentioned, the first with a lvl 20
> and a lvl 24. The lower lvl char is getting 20/44 =
> 45.5% of the exp, the higher char 24/44 = 54.5%.
> In the second case, a lvl 6 with a lvl 10 we get:
> 6/16 = 37.5% for the lower lvl char and 10/16 = 62.5%
> for the higher lvl char So if you look at these
> numers it makes a LOT of sense that the difference
> in levels isn't as significant as you get into the
> mid 20's and higher.

Actually, that makes perfect sense; I hadn't sat down to work out the
math like that, but now that you present it to me, I find it logical
and correct. Excellent point.

===
:D

believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
